languages.text: Прошлое Заккари Вайса преследовало его по пятам, в конце концов подведя астропата к границе безумия и поставив под угрозу корабль. Теперь капелла астропатического хора продолжает свою работу.

traits.locale_text: Прошлое Заккари Вайса буквально преследовало его по пятам, в конце концов подведя астропата к границе безумия и поставив под угрозу жизненно-важный компонент корабля. Теперь, когда с проблемой удалось разобраться, капелла астропатического хора продолжает свою работу.

languages.text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.
languages.original_text: Прошлое Заккари Вайса преследовало его по пятам, в конце концов подведя астропата к границе безумия и поставив под угрозу корабль. Теперь капелла астропатического хора продолжает свою работу.

traits.locale_text: Zacchary Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship.кNow the Astropathic Choir chapel is operating again.

Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Choir chapel is operating again.

Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.
Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

languages.text: El pasado del maestro del Coro Weisz le persiguió hasta llevarle al borde de la locura, poniendo en peligro la nave. Ahora la Capilla de Astrópatas vuelve a estar operativa.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

traits.locale_text: El pasado del maestro del Coro Weisz le persiguió hasta llevarle al borde de la locura, poniendo en peligro la nave. Ahora la Capilla de Astrópatas vuelve a estar operativa.

languages.text: クワイアーマスター・ワイズの過去が彼の首を締めて、感応通信官の彼を狂気の淵にまで追い詰め、船を危険に晒していた。現在、感応通信官の礼拝堂は再び稼働している。
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

traits.locale_text: クワイアーマスター・ワイズの過去が彼の首を締めて、感応通信官の彼を狂気の淵にまで追い詰め、船を危険に晒していた。現在、感応通信官の礼拝堂は再び稼働している。

languages.text: 此前，过去发生的事故一直萦绕在唱诗大师威茨心间，已经把这位星语者逼到了疯狂的边缘，整艘船也因此陷入了危险之中。如今，星语者礼拜堂又开始正常运作了。
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

traits.locale_text: 此前，过去发生的事故一直萦绕在唱诗大师威茨心间，已经把这位星语者逼到了疯狂的边缘，整艘船也因此陷入了危险之中。如今，星语者礼拜堂又开始正常运作了。

languages.text: Chormeister Weisz' Vergangenheit war ihm schon lange auf den Fersen, bis sie den Astropathen schließlich an den Rand des Wahnsinns getrieben und das Schiff gefährdet hat. Nun ist die Astropathische Kapelle wieder in Betrieb.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

traits.locale_text: Chormeister Weisz' Vergangenheit war ihm schon lange auf den Fersen, bis sie den Astropathen schließlich an den Rand des Wahnsinns getrieben und das Schiff gefährdet hat. Nun ist die Astropathische Kapelle wieder in Betrieb.

languages.text: Enfin rattrapé par son passé après l'avoir fui pendant des années, le maître de chœur Weisz a manqué sombrer dans la folie et conduire le vaisseau à sa perte. Mais la chapelle astropathique est de nouveau opérationnelle.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.

traits.locale_text: Enfin rattrapé par son passé après l'avoir fui pendant des années, le maître de chœur Weisz a manqué sombrer dans la folie et conduire le vaisseau à sa perte. Mais la chapelle astropathique est de nouveau opérationnelle.

languages.text: Geçmişi, Koro Şefi Weisz'ın üzerine çökmüştü ve Astropat'ı deliliğin sınırlarına taşıyor ve gemiyi tehlikeye atıyordu. Astropatik Şapel artık tekrar faaliyet gösterebilir durumda.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz's past had been breathing down his neck until it finally drove the Astropath to the edge of madness, endangering the ship. Now the Astropathic Chapel is operating again.
